wikipedia_page.main: Brian Thomas Adams (born 18 May 1947) is an English former footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Millwall. He began his senior career with Chelsea, without playing for them in the League, and went on to play non-league football for Wimbledon.

response: * Brian Adams (admiral), Australian admiral, Deputy Chief of Navy (2000–2002)
* Brian Adams (politician) (born 1969), member of the South Carolina Senate
* Brian Adams (racewalker) (born 1949), represented Great Britain at the 1976 Summer Olympics
* Brian Adams (wrestler) (1964–2007), professional wrestler and actor
* Brian Adams, chairman of Northern Irish team Ards F.C.
